description.lang: ZRC-100US Remotec Portable Controller BW8380US.Controls a wide range of Z-Wave compliant appliances such as switches, dimmers, drape controllers and motorized shades.Supports up to 16 Z-wave GROUP or SCENE.Supports 8 IR controlled A/V equipments with Learning Capability. Easy-to-use XpressZetup for typical users and powerful Advance Setup for experienced users. Best-in-class Association setup capability. Work as Primary or Secondary Controller,perfect companion for Z-Wave gateway.Supports bi-direction and multi-level replication - simplify cloning.Supports multi-channel devices.Supports Z-ExtenderTM.
